official_title: A resolution for the purpose of urging appropriate Federal, State and Local officials to take appropriate action to publicize the availability and benefits of passbook loans.

summary.text: Directs all Federal, State, and local officials to urge all United States savings and loans, commercial banks, and lending institutions to publicize the availability of passbook loans to their depositors permitted by the regulations of the Federal Home Loan Banking Board.

titles.title: A resolution for the purpose of urging appropriate Federal, State and Local officials to take appropriate action to publicize the availability and benefits of passbook loans.
